name: MOORABBIN AVIATION SERVICES PTY LTD
about: Moorabbin Aviation Services (MAS) is a highly certified flying school with over 30 years of experience in pilot training, boasting a 100% safety record. Approved by the Australian Civil Aviation Safety Authority (CASA) to deliver Part 141 and 142 training, MAS also has a CASA Approved Testing Officer on staff. We are a Registered Training Organisation (RTO) under the Australian Qualifications Framework (AQF) and CRICOS approved for international student training. With campuses at Moorabbin Airport, Mangalore Airport, and Bendigo City, MAS trains pilots for major airlines worldwide, including a specialized program for China Southern Airlines. Our graduates have successfully secured jobs with major airlines globally, reflecting our commitment to high standards and comprehensive training. MAS is dedicated to providing internationally recognized training, ensuring our students are well-equipped for a successful career in aviation.
services:
["First Steps & First Solo Flights
 Recreational Pilot License (R.P.L)
 Private Pilot License (PPL)
 Commercial Pilot License
Multi Engine Endorsement
 Night VFR rating
 Instrument Rating (Multi Engine)

 CSU Retractable

 DC3 Type Rating
 ASIC Applications
 GELP/AELP"]
